title: Late Night Finds Trump Out of Place at Prayer Breakfast
desc: The annual National Prayer Breakfast “is supposed to be a normal, nonpartisan event,” Seth Meyers said, “but, of course, Donald Trump is incapable of being normal.”

title: Minister: We’re not subdividing Isalalo forest land for human use
desc: DODOMA: THE government has said it has no plans to excise any part of the Isalalo Forest Reserve in Songwe Region for human settlement, stressing that the protected area must remain intact to safeguard water sources and the ecosystem. Deputy Minister for Natural Resources and Tourism, Hamad Chande, made the clarification in the National Assembly

title: 12 fresh charges for woman who harassed nurse during pandemic, created ruckus at lion dance event in Singapore
desc: SINGAPORE: A woman who was fined S$4,000 in 2022 after harassing her neighbour, a nurse, amid the Covid-19 outbreak now faces 12 charges for unrelated offences, including multiple counts of assault.

title: KPK Uncovers Rp 7 Billion Monthly Bribe Scheme Involving Customs Officials
desc: The payments were made on a monthly basis in exchange for clearing illegal imports ranging from shoes to other counterfeit products.

title: Government accelerates digital connectivity
desc: DODOMA: THE government has given new energy to the nation’s digital transformation agenda, with significant progress reported in the first 100 days of President Samia Suluhu Hassan’s renewed mandate. title: Allahabad High Court orders release of Wiztown director in Noida techie death case
